content: a smaller rectangle r1 6 chain r2-r4 6 single_crochet sew the bow to the head and cover the middle part with this smaller rectangle ⓒ copyright 2016 gabicrocheting all rights reserved gabicrocheting@gmail com hello kitty page �14 of 1� 4 if you like this pattern check our other patterns on ravelry and on craftsy http //www ravelry com/stores/ellad-designs http //www craftsy com/user/6386762/pattern-store all finished crocheted items made from this pattern may be sold if you maintain a link to the pattern thank you you are not allowed to sell copy distribute or share this pattern in any form ⓒ copyright 2016 gabicrocheting all rights reserved gabicrocheting@gmail com
